column2: Population of river flies at various points of rivers
Sample data of the population of river flies is converted to a score. If the cumculative score for an area dips below an agreed level this is reported and raised as an issue to investigate.
No further calculations were performed and this dataset is presented as found
The Riverfly partnership - Anglers' Riverfly Monitoring Initiative
